title: Bobby’s Uncomfortable Moment During Dinner At Russell Dickerson’s House + Bobby’s Mailbag: Proposing With Great Grandmother’s Ring + Bobby Caught Raymundo Inside His House
itunes:title: Bobby’s Uncomfortable Moment During Dinner At Russell Dickerson’s House + Bobby’s Mailbag: Proposing With Great Grandmother’s Ring + Bobby Caught Raymundo Inside His House
description:
Bobby and Amy went over to Russell Dickerson’s last night for dinner. Bobby said it was great except for one uncomfortable situation he found himself in. A listener emailed in about wanting to propose with his great-grandmother’s ring even though he knows it’s not the style she prefers. Bobby said he caught Raymundo at his house taking something.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
